channel.title: BM:S [v.1.0] Reactor - triger switch [Fixed]
channel.description: Switch to open the fire doors (main control room) in the reactor (Coolant Tank) starts to behave like an elevator - goes up and down, it is possible that the map is wrong load.

item.title: BM:S [v.1.0] Reactor - triger switch [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Nerus
item.description:
Switch to open the fire doors (main control room) in the reactor (Coolant Tank) starts to behave like an elevator - goes up and down, it is possible that the map is wrong load.
